messages.messageBody:
we recently began taking Sambucol and feel its an excellent product!
elderberries work as an anti-viral (main ingredient in Sambucol).
had heard so much great news about this elderberry product. it was
develped by a Virologist. also another super product is Emer'gen C.
its the best vitamin C we've ever taken! it also has 32 mineral
complexes and B vitamins.

help but wonder

in a few

military housing and
> 99% of my kids friends last year had this totally awful flu bug,
nasty colds,
> chicken pox, etc...and (2) we are a big family. A few years ago
we started
> taking ionic minerals, then coconut oil (me especially) and other
immune
> boosters. There is something you can buy in a health food store
called SAMBUCOL.
> It's from Israel and it's wonderful! Last year I remember feeling
the flu coming
> on; a little fever and headache and stomach ache, took some
sambucol &
> minerals before going to bed, and was able to 'head it off at the
pass' and woke up
> feeling wonderful the next morning. Also, one last thing that is
wonderful is
> this stuff called "Oscillococcinum". I would also take that at the
first sign
> of flu. In the box it says it's the #1 OTC flu medicine in France,
and the #1
> homeopathic flu medicine in the U.S.
> :) Amy

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Flu Shot....
messages.msgSnippet: Joylyn, I have autoimmune issues, and won t get the flu shot because I didn t HAVE autoimmune issues, until after getting my first (and only) flu shot. Of
messages.messageBody:
Joylyn,

I have autoimmune issues, and won't get the flu shot because I didn't HAVE
autoimmune issues, until after getting my first (and only) flu shot. Of course
I'm not positive that the flu shot was resonsible, but I can't help but wonder
sometimes. Anyway, my point is that my family has not had the flu in a few
years now, which is pretty considerable since (1) we live in military housing and
99% of my kids friends last year had this totally awful flu bug, nasty colds,
chicken pox, etc...and (2) we are a big family. A few years ago we started
taking ionic minerals, then coconut oil (me especially) and other immune
boosters. There is something you can buy in a health food store called SAMBUCOL.
It's from Israel and it's wonderful! Last year I remember feeling the flu coming
on; a little fever and headache and stomach ache, took some sambucol &
minerals before going to bed, and was able to 'head it off at the pass' and woke up
feeling wonderful the next morning. Also, one last thing that is wonderful is
this stuff called "Oscillococcinum". I would also take that at the first sign
of flu. In the box it says it's the #1 OTC flu medicine in France, and the #1
homeopathic flu medicine in the U.S.
:) Amy
